name: Minimalistic Life
description:
Minimalistic Life

Synopsis:

You wander around a celestial world where beings are defined by nothing but their primary needs . However some of their creatures may have lost their way, with corrupted hearts they harvested their world. You're the chosen one, you are tasked with helping the last one retrieve a more minimalist life.

"Let one walk alone, committing no sin, with few wishes, like elephants in the forest"

How To Play :

-Z to go forward

-Mouse to rotate

-E to pick up the Light

-SPACE to jump

-R to replay

-W to switch between walking and running

For Zenga Games 18/08/2018, Algeirs.

--EVERYTHING WAS MADE FROM SCRACTH--
